text: Floyd Adams, Jr. (May 11, 1945 â€“ February 1, 2014) was an American politician. He was from the state of Georgia. He was the former Mayor of Savannah, Georgia. He was a Democrat. Adams died in Savannah at the St. Joseph's Hospital from unknown causes. He was 68 years old. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2014 deaths Category:African-American politicians Category:American mayors Category:People from Savannah, Georgia Category:Politicians from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Floyd Adams Jr.
